t: Amazon.com: Odesza: A Moment Apart (Indie Exclusive Colored Vinyl) Vinyl 2LP: CDs & Vinyl
s: None of my other vinyls scratch so it's not my record player! ... I honestly did not like the sound of this album very much at first but it quickly grew on me. I enjoy listening to the past two albums by Odesza and I was apprehensive about this one but I had to buy it and give it a chance.

t: Amazon.com: Odeza The Last Goodbye: Limited Grey Marbled 2 LP: CDs & Vinyl
s: Just under two years ago, Odesza’s collaboration with Aussie producer Golden Features produced Bronson, a self-titled gem that went largely unnoticed outside of the artists’ spheres of influence. Underrated as it was, this project would begin to shape the evolution of Odesza’s sound.
